samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This example explains the default functionalities of the JavaScript Dashboard Layout with draggable and resizable panels.

samples.name: Predefined Layouts
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to change the initially defined panels structure with a set of predefined panel templates dynamically.

samples.name: API
samples.description: This sample demonstrates the most frequently used API combinations and dynamic addition and removal of panels within the layout.

samples.name: Editable Dashboard
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to add the data visualization components such as pie, column and spline chart in panels dynamically within the layout.

samples.name: SEO Analytics Dashboard
samples.description: This sample explains about constructing a real time dashboar.d for SEO analysis using data visualizing components like maps, charts, cards etc
